title: Searge: 命令方块可能还有更多改进
author: obby825
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2015-8-20 18:02 编辑 


Searge: Thanks for the great feedback on the command blocks. I've thought about it and decided to improve handling of flow with failing commands.
Searge: 感谢关于命令方块的反馈。我对此经过了思考，并打算增强处理失败的命令的方法。




Searge: The fact that chain command blocks need to be powered to be executed will not change. I designed it in this way for a good reasons.
Searge: Chain命令方块需要被充能才能被激活的特性不会改变。我设计成这样是有原因的。




Searge: It's a good example why I prefer a description of the problems people want to solve instead of ideas how something should be implemented.
Searge: 对于为什么我喜欢的是玩家对于他们想解决的问题的描述，而不是他们对于游戏中一些东西应该如何实现的想法，这是一个好的例子。
